I wore them for a 12 hr day and they fit just as good at the end of the day as when I put them on. Truly everything u could want in a legging and more. I’ll be buying a few more. Love them!  They are very comfortable and feel great!  Love the pocket’s for your phone.  I have purchased multiple colors of them. And the price is great!

I am obsessed with these leggings! So much so that I ordered a second pair! I'm a runner, and I've always had issues with leggings slipping or rolling down during my runs. These are the ones!!
Great work put pants, stretchy soft and love the side pockets. Perfect for this winter to keep my whole leg warm.

评论概述: Warm, ample in size, black L leggings
评论详情: I usually wear jeans, but I thought I'd try something new for winter. These leggings are toasty warm. I wouldn't use them for a heavy workout because I'd overheat. They're good for wearing around the house, running errands, or whatever. They have a pocket on each leg. They're high-waisted and long-legged. The ankle goes all the way down to my shoe top. I bought a L because I am a size 10-12, and while I wanted leggings that fit well, I didn't want them tight. I could have gotten a M. These are heavy-duty leggings and worth the price. Just what I wanted.

The fabric is stretchy, thin, and very comfortable. They feel like pjs to me. The color is exactly what I wanted. The size is what I expected. I just wish it hid more of my muffin top 🤣 and it seems to flatten my butt instead of lifting it like my other gym leggings. I'm on the fence if I'm going to return them or not. I'll wash them and see if they fit any better after that. I'll keep you posted. Oh! I do love the pockets. My Samsung galaxy pokes out but that's okay.
Not lined, shiny material, carrots length. RETURNING.
These leggings are so fabulous. Comfortable & flattering! I feel cozy and sexy at the same time.

I like the look and feel of these leggings. They are true to size and fit my legs, ankles, and rear in the right places. The only dislike I have is that the “stay put” waist really cuts into me. I’m 5’7” and about 190-195lbs. If I wear a form fitting shirt while wearing these, it creates and extra stomach roll that’s super unflattering. But if I’m wearing them with a loose tee or hoodie, they are fabulous.
Best leggings ever! True to fit ! Ordering more 🙌

I love the fit of these. Holds you in comfortably. I was worried when I felt the waste band that I wouldn’t like it but it doesn’t bother me at all like I thought it would. These are now my new favorite leggings!
I bought two pairs. They're decent quality and the fit is fantastic.

2nd pair. Nice weight with enough shape support and stretch. Wash all my black leggings together to minimize fuzzies. Ready for another pair.

The leggings fit well. They actually stay in place. I will be ordering another pair!

I bought these to compare them to my CRZ Yoga pair…I will be going back to CRZ Yoga and not purchasing TGP anymore.

评论概述: there is no band compression between seams

Love these pants. The fabric is of great quality and fit. What I like about the fit is that it hugs the body and gives a sleek silhouette. I would definitely recommend. For the price… you can’t go wrong.

After having a baby my mom belly is so hard to cover. And going back to the gym it's been hard to find quality leggings. These are perfect. High waisted so they cover the mom belly, plus it has a material around the stomach to keep the leggings from rolling or falling down. These leggings have pockets on the side as well. I love that These are squat proof and thicker than normal leggings so could be used not just for the gym but everyday wear. I am impressed and will be buying more of this brand. Also the value for money. Quality product!

I am a 5’8”, 220lbs gal. I ordered the size based on the size chart from my measurements. The leggings themselves fit wonderfully, the waists-band however is very uncomfortable. I wear my letting high on my waist and I feel like my ribs are being squeezed by a rubber band.
size  runs smaller than what I am use to purchasing.

The leggings fit well and don’t fall down like some of my other leggings do. I wish the pockets and lines on the side came up a little higher. I don’t like where they fall on my leg. Other than that they are great leggings!

These leggings are like a magnet for lint and pet hair. The compression level is nil, except for a one inch wide strip around the waistband, which is incongruously tight and really the only thing that holds them up. Cheaply made. They are made from a fabric that looks like it will pill easily and after a wash or two. Hate them. Stuck with them.

Washed them before wearing as they had a strong chemical smell. Wore them for an hour doing workout and knees became baggy do to very poor elasticity of material. I'm stuck with them as they were worn. I've  purchased this brand before and disappointed in the change in quality.

There is a 1/2” elastic band sewed into the waistband which is not comfortable at all. Overall length, pocket, support are fine but this elastic waistband is tight and unnecessary.  Note- it’s PART of the waist, I’m not referencing the entire 3” spandex waistband.

I really like these, more of a cotton feel then that spandex feel. I'm 5,9 long legs about 200lbs and bought a size large. Normally would wear an xtra large but I wanted more compression. No rolling top which is great cause I'm up and down through out my shifts. Def will buy again.
I will be giving these to a friend, instead of returning . They run small and tight and don’t feel comfortable. I am 5’10 and 160 lbs and ordered a medium. The pockets are great tho.

These leggings are very comfortable and warm.  They did cause a flag when going through airport security. I was flagged for having something on my lower back which resulting in having a pat-down search. I think it was the back pocket that was empty.

I was scouring the reviews for leggings trying to find a good pair since it's really hit and miss on amazon. All of the reviews claimed that they were "buttery soft" and felt like high end leggings.  WRONG.  I'm seriously wondering if any of them ever owned a pair of high end leggings. I usually get beyond yoga leggings but they go for $100 (they're literally the softest most luxurious leggings if you haven't tried them you should definitely splurge and get you a pair - you'll never go back to cheap leggings) anyway times are tough and I thought I'd chance a cheap pair. And you get exactly what you pay for. The material is thick and rough. There's an inch elastic band that runs through the waist. Which is the most uncomfortable thing ever. My husband asked if I was going to try them on before returning, and I said NO! and made him feel them. These are the words he used to describe them:  "Rough, hard, itchy"  And this was a man that didn't understand my love for $100 leggings but I guess he does now 😆

评论概述: Perfect fit and long enough for my legs

I've been wearing these for about a year now and I still love them. The cheetah print design and fabric have held up after many washes, and they are still cute and comfortable.

love the feel and the fit of these leggings-great durability and value

I love everything about these leggings except for the material. The fit is great, the length is perfect for my 5’ 10” frame, the side pockets are the best! BUT the material is so weird! I’ve bought leggings on Amazon before and these just look dingy and everything sticks to them so easily! The pic I took is after only wearing for a few hours and having already used a lint roller halfway through while having them on. They pick up every piece of hair, lint etc and show any sign of dirt. I have bought other leggings like these that I’ve been happy with. But if you want a pair of nice black sleek leggings these are not it. Sorry y’all! Giving a 3 star only because there are some things that are positive but I will not be keeping the second pair I bought.

I’ve been looking for a strong, compression/smoothing tummy control, everyday yoga pant that wasn’t crazy expensive or thin and flimsy. These are my go to from now on. Nice thick band holds my belly snug and the high waist keeps and cracks from slipping out.

These pants are perfect in holding my belly in and giving me a slimmer look. They don't ride down like so many others. I just ordered another pair and can't wait to throw out my old ones that never fit right!

评论概述: Love these leggings, went back for 2 more

These pants are the most comfortable I’ve ever worn. Material is thick and silky smooth. The legs are not too tight. The pockets are perfect.  I always have trouble with the rise and waist of other pants but these are perfect. I ordered three colors and now will order the other colors. If I could rate them 10 stars I would.

Ultimately, you can tell these are cheap. The seams are thick, the material is oddly thick too. They're truly not bad at all...but you can tell they're $20. Pockets are nice, i have a feeling they'll snag soon too.

I gave it two stars because while it was not the material i wanted, the material was thick and had tummy control.

I love these pants!  I wasn't expecting much, due to the low cost...but they fit wonderfully and feel super comfortable.  They are much thicker than my usual go to leggings.  FYI:  I did go up one size from my usual.
Quality product that fits as advertised.  Comfortable and launder well.

The material is not see through, not too thin or thick. I don't like the waistband, it has a thin elastic inside the waistband at the very top, encouraging muffin tops, whether you normally have one or not. The material is not itchy, but not that comfortable either. Pockets are sized for a small phone. In general, they are ok. I did not return my black leggings but will not purchase again, nor would I recommend others to. I am typically a large, and it fit as I expected.

I love these leggings. I CrossFit and they provide great compression and the high waist keeps the leggings in place when squatting. I also like that they are not see through at all. Most definitely will buy again in another color

These fit so well! I actually sized down 2 sizes and they fit perfect. I will be buying more of them.

These are the best leggings I’ve found for the price! They are super durable and a think but not hot material. They stay in place very well when working out and fit true to size. I’m 5’1” and 178lbs. I bought size large. They are super comfortable and have great tummy control. They’re super soft and stretchy, but not spandexy. I’ve bought several pair and will continue to purchase in the future.
These leggings are amazing! They stay up well, the high waist holds in my mom pooch, and best of all—POCKETS! I can't live without pockets, and these are perfect for my phone and credit card.

Comfortable for walking. Not ideal for working out as the the booty is see-through when you bend or squat. No tummy control. I could probably go a size smaller. I went by my current measurements and they’re a bit loose so may run big.  Love the color.

But the material is not good, doesn’t look new. Maybe I got a worn pair? Would not recommend and I’m returning mine.

I’ve bought a lot of Amazon workout leggings these are def not my fav. The band at the top is a thin elastic band vs the tummy tuck/no show kind of band most leggings have. Material isn’t buttery or flexible. They work okay.
I love the way that this Legging high waist band comfortably holds me just right. The material gives you the right stretch and moves with you comfortably. I recommend & will buy again. 5 Stars!

I absolutely love these leggings. I have purchased two size XL pairs and one 2XL pair. I love the compression of the XL but they're not squat proof. The 2XL pairs are super comfortable for all day wear during work and not an issue while squatting.
